content: The Zagg InvisibleShield Glass+ sounds like a great option. I've had some bad experiences with bubbles in the past, so it's good to know that it's "bubble-free guaranteed". I'll definitely check out the reviews and make sure it's compatible with my phone model. By the way, I also got a 3-pack of screen protectors from Amazon last month for $6.99, but the first one I applied wasn't bubble-free, so I had to toss it and use the second one.
